name: Expedition (UF Digital Worlds Institute)
description:
Expedition

Created by Daniel Legcevic

At first glance this game is a quality 2D side-scrolling puzzle platformer that does everything right and checks every box. Even the title is generic but solid.

Digging deeper (sorry), besides scratching a tomb raiding exploration itch, Expedition becomes something more than expected and the gameplay suddenly levels up considerably.

One of those games with a hidden well of fun for those brave enough to download and play.
